content: Provider report from Evergreen Neurology details care plan for Lyme case (Patient ID NWL198755) with neurological manifestations. Treatment timeline shows oral doxycycline initiated 03/2023, transitioned to IV ceftriaxone in April after incomplete response. Document highlights insurance delays in approving at-home infusion services requested for Spokane address (99201). Patient demographic: female with worker's compensation claim related tick exposure.
